meaningThai: มีความสุข
examples: I feel happy with how today went.
She looks genuinely happy in that photo.

meaningThai: เศร้า
examples: He seemed sad after the meeting.
The ending of the movie made me sad.

meaningThai: โกรธ
examples: She was angry about the mistake.
I get angry when plans keep changing.

meaningThai: ตื่นเต้นดีใจ
examples: I’m excited for the trip.
He looked excited to start the project.

meaningThai: ประหม่า, กังวล
examples: She felt nervous before the exam.
I’m nervous about the interview tomorrow.

meaningThai: วิตกกังวล
examples: I get anxious in crowded places.
He looked anxious while waiting for the results.

meaningThai: สงบ
examples: Her voice makes me feel calm.
He stayed calm in a stressful situation.

meaningThai: หงุดหงิดเพราะทำอะไรไม่ได้
examples: I’m frustrated with this assignment.
She felt frustrated after trying so many times.

meaningThai: โล่งใจ
examples: I’m relieved the issue is solved.
He felt relieved after telling the truth.

meaningThai: ขอบคุณจากใจ
examples: I’m grateful for your help.
She felt grateful for the support.

meaningThai: มีความหวัง
examples: I’m hopeful about the future.
She sounded hopeful after the meeting.

meaningThai: ผิดหวัง
examples: He was disappointed with the results.
I’m disappointed that it didn’t work out.

meaningThai: มั่นใจ
examples: She feels confident in her skills.
I’m confident this will succeed.

meaningThai: ไม่มั่นใจในตัวเอง
examples: He feels insecure about his work.
I get insecure when comparing myself to others.

meaningThai: ท่วมท้น, รับไม่ไหว
examples: I’m overwhelmed with deadlines.
She looked overwhelmed by the news.

meaningThai: พอใจ, อิ่มใจ
examples: I feel content with my progress.
He looked calm and content.

meaningThai: อิจฉา, หึงหวง
examples: She felt jealous when she saw the photo.
I’m not jealous, just curious.

meaningThai: อาย, เขินเพราะทำอะไรพลาด
examples: I felt embarrassed after saying that.
He gets embarrassed easily.

meaningThai: ภูมิใจ
examples: I’m proud of what we achieved.
She felt proud of her progress.

meaningThai: เหงา
examples: He feels lonely living abroad.
I get lonely sometimes at night.

meaningThai: เหนื่อย
examples: I’m tired after a long day.
She looked tired but kept working.

meaningThai: เครียด
examples: I’ve been stressed all week.
He gets stressed during exams.

meaningThai: ขี้อาย
examples: She’s shy around new people.
I was too shy to speak up.

meaningThai: รำคาญ
examples: I’m annoyed by the noise.
He was annoyed at the delay.

meaningThai: งง, ไม่เข้าใจ
examples: I’m confused by the instructions.
She looked confused after the lecture.

meaningThai: ช็อก, ตกใจมาก
examples: I was shocked by the news.
He looked shocked when he heard it.

meaningThai: แปลกใจ
examples: I was surprised to see her there.
He loves surprising people.

meaningThai: ละอายใจ
examples: She felt ashamed after yelling.
I’m ashamed of my reaction.

meaningThai: มีความหวัง
examples: I’m hopeful things will get better.
He remained hopeful despite the challenges.

meaningThai: เจ็บใจ, เสียใจ
examples: His words really hurt me.
She looked hurt after hearing that.

meaningThai: มีแรงบันดาลใจ, มีไฟ
examples: I feel motivated to work today.
She’s motivated to reach her goals.

meaningThai: หมดกำลังใจ
examples: He felt discouraged after failing.
Don’t get discouraged—try again.

meaningThai: สงบสุข
examples: This place makes me feel peaceful.
She enjoys peaceful mornings.

meaningThai: หงุดหงิด, รำคาญ
examples: I’m irritated by the loud noise.
He sounded irritated on the call.

meaningThai: ไร้อารมณ์, เฉย ๆ
examples: He looked emotionless during the talk.
I felt emotionless after a long day.

meaningThai: คิดถึงอดีต, หวนวันเก่า ๆ
examples: This song makes me nostalgic.
He gets nostalgic about childhood a lot.

meaningThai: เหงาแบบลึกซึ้ง, เศร้าปนคิดถึง
examples: The movie has a melancholic tone.
I get melancholic on rainy days.

meaningThai: มีความสุขสุดขีด
examples: Winning made me euphoric.
She felt euphoric after hearing the news.

meaningThai: กังวลว่าจะเกิดเรื่องไม่ดี
examples: I’m apprehensive about tomorrow.
She felt apprehensive meeting new people.

meaningThai: ยอมรับแบบจำใจ, ไม่มีหวังแล้ว
examples: He gave a resigned smile.
I feel resigned about the situation.

meaningThai: อารมณ์บูด, หงุดหงิดง่าย
examples: I get grumpy when I’m sleep-deprived.
He’s always grumpy in the morning.

meaningThai: ตื่นเต้นมาก, ดีใจสุด ๆ
examples: I’m thrilled to be part of this project.
She felt thrilled after reading the message.

meaningThai: กระสับกระส่าย, อยู่นิ่งไม่ได้
examples: I feel restless today.
He’s been restless all night.

meaningThai: ขยะแขยง, ไม่ชอบมาก
examples: She looked disgusted by the smell.
I’m disgusted by the behavior.

meaningThai: ประทับใจมากจนซึ้ง
examples: I was touched by your kindness.
He felt touched by the surprise.

meaningThai: เบื่อ
examples: I’m bored of doing the same routine.
He gets bored easily.

meaningThai: มีความสุขมาก, ร่าเริง
examples: Her smile looked joyful.
The celebration was joyful.

meaningThai: ทุกข์ใจมาก, แย่สุด ๆ
examples: I felt miserable last week.
She looked miserable in the rain.

meaningThai: ตื่นตระหนก
examples: I panicked when I lost my phone.
He panicked during the exam.

meaningThai: พอใจ
examples: I’m satisfied with the results.
She felt satisfied after finishing the task.

meaningThai: รู้สึกโดนว่า, เจ็บใจเพราะคำพูด
examples: He felt offended by the comment.
I’m sorry if you felt offended—I didn’t mean it.

meaningThai: คิดถึงบ้าน
examples: She felt homesick on her first day abroad.
I get homesick when I travel for too long.

meaningThai: รู้สึกได้รับการปลอบใจ
examples: His words comforted me.
I felt comforted being with my friends.

meaningThai: มีความหวัง
examples: I’m hopeful things will get better.
She remained hopeful throughout the challenge.

meaningThai: มองโลกแง่ร้าย
examples: He’s pessimistic about the plan.
I get pessimistic when things go wrong.

meaningThai: มองโลกแง่ดี
examples: I’m optimistic about the future.
She stayed optimistic even in tough times.

meaningThai: ละอายใจ, รู้สึกผิดแบบหนัก
examples: He felt ashamed of his mistake.
I’m ashamed I reacted like that.

meaningThai: เศร้าโศก, สูญเสียอย่างลึกซึ้ง
examples: She’s grieving the loss of her pet.
He has been grieving for months.

meaningThai: ดีใจมาก ๆ
examples: She was overjoyed when she got the news.
I’m overjoyed with the results.

meaningThai: ขุ่นเคือง, เก็บความโกรธไว้
examples: He felt resentful after being ignored.
I’m resentful about how things were handled.

meaningThai: อึ้ง, ตกใจจนพูดไม่ออก
examples: I was stunned by the announcement.
The whole room went silent—everyone was stunned.

meaningThai: กลัวมาก
examples: She was terrified of the dark.
I’m terrified of losing my passport.

meaningThai: กังวล
examples: I’m worried about my exam.
She looked worried all day.

meaningThai: รู้สึกผิด
examples: I feel guilty for forgetting.
He looked guilty after the accident.

meaningThai: เข้าใจความรู้สึกผู้อื่น
examples: She’s very empathetic.
Try to be more empathetic in tough situations.

meaningThai: เห็นใจ, เข้าใจว่าคนอื่นลำบาก
examples: He gave me a sympathetic smile.
I feel sympathetic toward her situation.

meaningThai: กังวลหนักมาก
examples: I was worried sick when you didn’t call.
She’s worried sick about her exams.

meaningThai: ลังเล
examples: I’m hesitant to make a decision.
She seemed hesitant to speak.

meaningThai: ไม่ทันตั้งตัว
examples: The question caught me off guard.
He looked off guard when I walked in.

meaningThai: รู้สึกซาบซึ้งใจ
examples: I’m touched by your message.
He looked touched when he received the gift.

meaningThai: หมดแรงทางอารมณ์
examples: I’m emotionally drained after today.
That conversation left me drained.

meaningThai: เปี่ยมด้วยความสุข
examples: It was a joyous celebration.
She felt joyous holding the puppy.

meaningThai: อกหัก, เสียใจมาก
examples: She was heartbroken after the breakup.
I feel heartbroken hearing the news.

meaningThai: มีความรู้สึกขัดแย้งในใจ
examples: I’m conflicted about the decision.
He looked conflicted after hearing both sides.

meaningThai: รำคาญ
examples: He sounded annoyed on the call.
I’m annoyed by all the noise outside.

meaningThai: มีหวังแต่ก็กลัว
examples: I’m hopeful yet scared about the results.
She felt hopeful yet scared for the interview.

meaningThai: น้ำตาคลอ, จะร้องไห้
examples: She gave a tearful goodbye.
He looked tearful after the speech.

meaningThai: ขอบคุณมาก
examples: I’m grateful for your help.
He’s grateful to be here.

meaningThai: พูดไม่ออกเพราะตกใจหรือซึ้ง
examples: I’m speechless after seeing the results.
She was speechless with joy.

meaningThai: อึดอัด, เขินแบบแปลก ๆ
examples: The silence was awkward.
I felt awkward meeting his parents.

meaningThai: โศกเศร้าเสียใจหนัก
examples: They were grieving after the accident.
He’s still grieving for his friend.

meaningThai: ทึ่งสุด ๆ
examples: That plot twist got me mind-blown.
I was mind-blown by the performance.

meaningThai: เครียดมาก
examples: I’m stressed out because of the workload.
She gets stressed out easily.

meaningThai: ตกใจกลัวง่าย, เหมือนจะพัง
examples: I get panicky before public speaking.
He became panicky during the storm.

meaningThai: รู้สึกถูกปลอบใจ
examples: Your message comforted me.
He felt comforted after the talk.

meaningThai: สุขปนเศร้า
examples: Graduation feels bittersweet.
It was a bittersweet goodbye.

meaningThai: รำคาญแต่ก็ขำ
examples: I’m annoyed but amused by your chaos.
She looked annoyed but amused.

meaningThai: สนใจมาก, อยากรู้ต่อ
examples: I’m intrigued by this idea.
He looked intrigued by the story.

meaningThai: ขุ่นเคืองใจ, โกรธสะสม
examples: He felt resentful after being ignored.
I’m resentful about how things happened.

meaningThai: กลัว
examples: I’m afraid of heights.
She’s afraid to try again.

meaningThai: มีความสุข ร่าเริง
examples: It was a joyful moment.
She looked joyful during the ceremony.

meaningThai: หมดกำลังใจ, ท้อแท้
examples: I felt disheartened by the feedback.
He seemed disheartened after the loss.

meaningThai: ไม่สบายใจ, กระวนกระวาย
examples: I feel uneasy about this.
She looked uneasy all night.

meaningThai: ดีใจมาก
examples: I’m delighted to meet you.
She was delighted with the surprise.

meaningThai: อบอุ่นใจ, น่าซาบซึ้ง
examples: That video was heartwarming.
Her message was truly heartwarming.

meaningThai: หมดแรง, เหนื่อยล้า
examples: I feel drained after work.
He looked completely drained.

meaningThai: มีกำลังใจขึ้น
examples: Her words uplifted me.
The music made me feel uplifted.

meaningThai: หงุดหงิดมาก
examples: She was irritated by his remarks.
I get irritated easily today.

meaningThai: รู้สึกถ่อมตัวลง, ตระหนักว่าต้องพัฒนา
examples: The challenge humbled me.
He felt humbled after seeing the results.

meaningThai: ทุ่มเท, มีไฟในสิ่งที่รัก
examples: She’s passionate about design.
I feel passionate when I work on this project.

meaningThai: กลัว, หวาดกลัว
examples: She looked fearful during the storm.
I’m fearful of what might happen next.

meaningThai: ไม่สบายใจ, อึดอัด
examples: I feel uncomfortable in this situation.
He looked uncomfortable answering that question.

meaningThai: มีแรงผลักดัน, มีไฟทำงาน
examples: I’m motivated to finish this today.
Her success motivated me.

meaningThai: ซาบซึ้งใจ
examples: I was truly touched by your letter.
He felt touched when they remembered his birthday.

meaningThai: รู้สึกขยะแขยง
examples: I’m disgusted by the smell.
She looked disgusted at the scene.

meaningThai: ไม่สบายใจ, เสียใจหรือโกรธ
examples: She was upset after the meeting.
I’m upset you didn’t tell me sooner.

meaningThai: มีหวัง
examples: I’m hopeful things will improve.
He stayed hopeful through the difficulties.

meaningThai: เฉยชา, ไม่สนใจ
examples: He seemed apathetic during the discussion.
I’m feeling apathetic about everything today.

meaningThai: ได้รับการฟื้นฟู, กลับมาดีขึ้น
examples: Her energy feels restored after a long break.
The good news restored my hope.

meaningThai: ได้รับแรงบันดาลใจ
examples: I’m inspired by your work ethic.
That story really inspired me.

meaningThai: รู้สึกโดนดูถูก
examples: He felt offended by the joke.
I didn’t mean to offend you.

meaningThai: อารมณ์แปรปรวน
examples: She gets moody in the evenings.
I’m feeling moody today.

meaningThai: ดีใจมากเป็นพิเศษ
examples: She was ecstatic about the results.
He felt ecstatic holding the award.

meaningThai: โกรธเคือง, สะสมความไม่พอใจ
examples: I’m resentful of how they treated me.
He grew resentful over time.

meaningThai: สำนึกในบุญคุณ
examples: I’m grateful you’re here.
She felt grateful for the opportunity.

meaningThai: รู้สึกแพ้, สิ้นหวัง
examples: I felt defeated after the test.
He looked defeated but kept trying.

meaningThai: รู้สึกมีพลัง, กล้าทำสิ่งใหม่
examples: I feel empowered to take action.
Her support empowered me.

meaningThai: มีความเมตตา, เห็นอกเห็นใจ
examples: She’s very compassionate with others.
Try to be more compassionate toward yourself.

meaningThai: อยู่นิ่งไม่ได้, วุ่นวายใจ
examples: I feel restless waiting for the results.
He’s been restless all week.

meaningThai: เศร้าโศกจากการสูญเสีย
examples: He’s still grieving his friend.
The family was grieving together.

meaningThai: คิดถึงวันเก่า ๆ
examples: This song makes me nostalgic.
I feel nostalgic about college days.

meaningThai: เศร้า ซึม ๆ
examples: I’m feeling blue today.
Rainy days make me feel blue.

meaningThai: สงบลงหลังจากเครียด
examples: The message calmed me down.
He finally calmed after the chaos.

meaningThai: มีความหวัง
examples: I’m hopeful about next year.
He stayed hopeful even after failing.

meaningThai: อึดอัดใจ, ไม่สบายใจ
examples: I have an uneasy feeling about this.
She looked uneasy waiting alone.

meaningThai: รับสิ่งเร้ามากเกินไปจนล้า
examples: I get overstimulated in large crowds.
The noise made me feel overstimulated.

meaningThai: ดีใจ
examples: I’m glad you liked it.
He seemed glad to help.

meaningThai: กังวล
examples: I’m worried about the deadline.
She looked worried the whole time.

meaningThai: ละอายใจ
examples: She felt ashamed of her actions.
I’m ashamed I forgot.

meaningThai: ตกใจแบบฉับพลัน
examples: The sound startled me.
He looked startled when I called him.

meaningThai: รู้สึกมีพลัง, ควบคุมชีวิตได้
examples: I feel empowered after the talk.
She empowered her team with optimism.

meaningThai: สุขล้น, ร่าเริง
examples: He looked joyful at the celebration.
The event was full of joyful energy.

meaningThai: กลัวอย่างมาก
examples: She was frightened by the noise.
I get frightened watching horror movies.

meaningThai: เศร้าใจมาก, ทุกข์ใจ
examples: Her expression looked sorrowful.
He wrote a sorrowful message.

meaningThai: สงสัย ไม่ค่อยเชื่อ
examples: I’m skeptical about the idea.
He looked skeptical during the meeting.

meaningThai: รู้สึกอบอุ่น ได้รับการปลอบ
examples: Her presence comforted me.
He felt comforted during the call.

meaningThai: รู้สึกกล้าขึ้น, กล้าตัดสินใจ
examples: The success emboldened me.
His words emboldened the team.

meaningThai: เหงานิด ๆ แต่ไม่เป็นไร
examples: I’m lonely but okay, don’t worry.
She felt lonely but okay living alone.

meaningThai: รู้สึกสดชื่น ฟื้นพลังใจ
examples: Your message uplifted me.
I feel uplifted after that talk.

meaningThai: มึนงง, ตั้งสติไม่ทัน
examples: I felt dazed after waking up.
He looked dazed by the news.

meaningThai: ชา, ไม่รู้สึกอะไร
examples: I feel emotionally numb today.
He became numb after too much stress.

meaningThai: รู้สึกมีกำลังใจมากขึ้น
examples: Her encouragement heartened me.
I felt heartened after the update.

meaningThai: หมดใจ, ท้อแท้
examples: I feel discouraged by my mistakes.
She looked discouraged but pushed on.

meaningThai: รู้สึกเติมเต็ม
examples: Helping others makes me feel fulfilled.
He felt fulfilled with his career path.

meaningThai: ประทับใจจนรู้สึกซึ้ง
examples: I was deeply moved by your kindness.
The speech moved the whole audience.

meaningThai: จริงใจลึกซึ้ง
examples: She wrote a heartfelt message.
I appreciate your heartfelt apology.

meaningThai: คิดมากเกินไป
examples: I’m overthinking everything right now.
She tends to overthink small details.

meaningThai: กระตือรือร้น
examples: He’s enthusiastic about the event.
I feel enthusiastic to start.

meaningThai: ท้อแต่ยังสู้
examples: I’m discouraged but trying.
She’s discouraged but keeps going.

meaningThai: ล้าทางอารมณ์ขั้นสุด
examples: I’m emotionally exhausted this week.
He felt emotionally exhausted after the fight.

meaningThai: โกรธเคืองในใจแต่ไม่พูด
examples: I’m resentful but silent about the situation.
She looked resentful but stayed quiet.

meaningThai: ดูนิ่งแต่ในใจเป็นห่วง
examples: I’m calm but worried inside.
She appeared calm but worried the whole time.

meaningThai: ตึงเครียด
examples: The atmosphere felt tense.
I get tense before big presentations.

meaningThai: อบอุ่น, แสดงความรัก
examples: He’s very affectionate with his family.
Her message was sweet and affectionate.

meaningThai: มั่นใจแต่แอบประหม่า
examples: I’m confident yet nervous for the interview.
She felt confident yet nervous on stage.

meaningThai: ผิดหวังหนัก, ใจสลาย
examples: I was crushed by the results.
He looked crushed after hearing the news.

meaningThai: มองบวกแต่ไม่ประมาท
examples: I’m optimistic but cautious about the plan.
She’s optimistic but cautious of the risks.

meaningThai: ระวังใจ, ไม่เปิดเผยอารมณ์ง่าย
examples: He’s guarded around new people.
I feel guarded after what happened.

meaningThai: เกรง, กลัวเพราะอีกฝ่ายดูเหนือกว่า
examples: I felt intimidated walking into the room.
She gets intimidated by big crowds.

meaningThai: ดีขึ้นแล้ว แต่ยังล้า
examples: I’m uplifted but tired.
She felt uplifted but tired after the talk.

meaningThai: คิดถึงอดีตและรู้สึกดี
examples: I feel nostalgic but happy listening to this song.
She looked nostalgic but happy flipping through old photos.

meaningThai: สงบนิ่ง, สบายใจ
examples: The morning felt serene.
She looked serene watching the sunset.

meaningThai: ใจหนัก, กังวลหรือเศร้าแบบลึก
examples: My heart feels heavy today.
She spoke with a heart-heavy tone.

meaningThai: มองโลกในแง่ดี
examples: He’s optimistic about the future.
I’m optimistic this will work out.

meaningThai: ตั้งการ์ด, ปกป้องตัวเองมากไป
examples: He got defensive when questioned.
I wasn’t trying to be defensive.

meaningThai: รู้สึกได้รับการยอมรับ, เห็นคุณค่า
examples: His words made me feel validated.
I feel validated hearing that feedback.

meaningThai: รู้สึกแยกจากคนอื่น, โดดเดี่ยว
examples: I feel isolated even in a crowd.
She felt isolated living far away.

meaningThai: กังวลแต่ยังมีความหวัง
examples: I’m anxious but hopeful for tomorrow.
She’s anxious but hopeful about her future.

meaningThai: เหนื่อยมากแต่ซาบซึ้ง
examples: I’m overwhelmed but grateful for the support.
He felt overwhelmed but grateful after the event.

meaningThai: รู้สึกมีพลัง
examples: I feel energized after the nap.
She looked energized in the morning.

meaningThai: รู้สึกด้อยกว่า
examples: He felt inferior next to his peers.
I sometimes feel inferior without reason.

meaningThai: เหนือกว่า, รู้สึกมั่นใจมาก
examples: She felt superior in the discussion.
Don’t act superior to others.

meaningThai: เจ็บในใจแต่ทำเหมือนโอเค
examples: I’m hurt but pretending fine.
She smiled even though she was hurt inside.

meaningThai: ได้รับการปลอบใจแต่ยังเศร้า
examples: I’m comforted but sad about the outcome.
She felt comforted but sad.

meaningThai: รู้สึกชื่นชม, นับถือ
examples: I admired her bravery.
He felt admired by the team.

meaningThai: ซาบซึ้งแต่รับมือยาก
examples: I’m grateful but overwhelmed by all the support.
She felt grateful but overwhelmed with responsibilities.

meaningThai: มีความหวังแต่ยังไม่มั่นใจ
examples: I’m hopeful but unsure how it’ll end.
She felt hopeful but unsure about her choice.

meaningThai: มั่นใจเกินไป
examples: He was overconfident before the test.
Don’t be overconfident too early.

meaningThai: อบอุ่นใจ
examples: Her words made me feel warm inside.
He gave me a warm smile.

meaningThai: มีความกังวล, มีเรื่องในใจ
examples: He looked troubled the whole day.
I’m troubled by the situation.

meaningThai: อ่อนไหว
examples: I’m sensitive about that topic.
She’s quite sensitive to criticism.

meaningThai: น้ำตาแห่งความสุข
examples: I cried joyful tears.
It brought joyful tears to everyone.

meaningThai: เสียใจอย่างยับเยิน
examples: He was devastated by the news.
I’m devastated but trying to stay strong.

meaningThai: เสียใจอย่างจี้ใจ
examples: I felt sharp regret saying that.
She had sharp regret after the mistake.

meaningThai: หัวใจเต็มไปด้วยความรู้สึกดี
examples: My heart feels full today.
He smiled with a heart-full expression.

meaningThai: อยู่กับปัจจุบันทั้งใจและอารมณ์
examples: I’m trying to be emotionally present.
She felt emotionally present during the talk.

meaningThai: เหมือนไม่อยู่ในโมเมนต์ทางอารมณ์
examples: He looked emotionally absent today.
I feel emotionally absent lately.

meaningThai: ประหม่า, เหมือนจะระเบิดได้ทุกเวลา
examples: I’m on edge waiting for the call.
She’s been on edge since morning.

meaningThai: มีพลังขึ้นแต่ก็หวั่น
examples: I’m empowered but scared to take the next step.
She felt empowered but scared after the decision.

meaningThai: มีความหวังแต่ยังเศร้าอยู่
examples: I’m hopeful but sad about moving on.
She felt hopeful but sad packing her things.

meaningThai: โกรธจัด
examples: He was furious after hearing the news.
I’m furious this keeps happening.

meaningThai: ผ่อนคลาย
examples: I feel relaxed near the ocean.
She looked relaxed after yoga class.

meaningThai: ลังเลแต่พร้อมลอง
examples: I’m hesitant but willing to try.
She’s hesitant but willing to join.

meaningThai: ซาบซึ้งลึก ๆ
examples: I was deeply moved by their kindness.
He looked deeply moved during the ceremony.

meaningThai: ใจสั่น, ตกใจต่อเหตุการณ์
examples: I’m still shaken from last night.
He sounded shaken on the call.

meaningThai: มีสติรู้ตัว
examples: I’m trying to be more mindful.
She practices being mindful daily.

meaningThai: ชาแบบรับได้, เฉยแต่ไม่เจ็บ
examples: I feel comfortably numb lately.
He grew comfortably numb to stress.

meaningThai: อ่อนไหวมากเป็นพิเศษ
examples: I’m emotionally raw after the breakup.
She’s too emotionally raw to talk now.

meaningThai: โล่งใจแต่หมดแรง
examples: I’m relieved but exhausted after finishing the project.
She was relieved but exhausted after the exam.

meaningThai: อิ่มเอมใจ, รู้สึกเต็มเปี่ยม
examples: I feel emotionally fulfilled today.
Her support made me feel emotionally fulfilled.

meaningThai: อารมณ์มั่นคง
examples: I’m trying to stay emotionally steady.
She appeared emotionally steady through the chaos.

meaningThai: คอยสนับสนุนทางใจ
examples: He’s always emotionally supportive.
I felt emotionally supported by my friends.

meaningThai: ใจฟื้นขึ้น, ดีขึ้นอย่างมาก
examples: Her message made me emotionally uplifted.
I feel emotionally uplifted this morning.

meaningThai: รู้สึกตัวเล็ก, ไม่มีคุณค่า
examples: I felt small in that meeting.
Her comment made me feel small.

meaningThai: ห่างเหินทางอารมณ์
examples: He seems emotionally distant lately.
I get emotionally distant when stressed.

meaningThai: สบายใจขึ้นหลังได้รับการยืนยัน
examples: His words reassured me.
I felt reassured after hearing the update.

meaningThai: รู้สึกฟื้นพลังใจ
examples: The break revived my spirit.
I feel revived after the nap.

meaningThai: เชื่อมโยงกันทางใจ
examples: We felt emotionally connected instantly.
That talk made me feel emotionally connected.

meaningThai: สงบแบบสบายใจ
examples: The morning felt comfortably peaceful.
Her presence makes me comfortably peaceful.

meaningThai: หลงทางทางอารมณ์
examples: I feel lost lately.
He looked lost in his thoughts.

meaningThai: ใจไม่นิ่ง, สั่นคลอน
examples: I’m emotionally shaky today.
She sounded emotionally shaky.

meaningThai: ใจอ่อน, อ่อนไหวง่าย
examples: She’s soft-hearted around animals.
I get soft-hearted easily.

meaningThai: ซึ้งจนพูดไม่ออก
examples: I’m touched but speechless.
He was touched but speechless by the surprise.

meaningThai: อารมณ์นุ่มนวล ผ่อนคลาย
examples: I feel mellow this evening.
The music put me in a mellow mood.

meaningThai: อารมณ์แรง, ลึกมาก
examples: It was an emotionally intense moment.
He can be emotionally intense sometimes.

meaningThai: เศร้าแบบเงียบ ๆ
examples: I’m quietly sad today.
She looked quietly sad during dinner.

meaningThai: หมดพลังแต่ยังมีความหวัง
examples: I’m emotionally drained but hopeful.
She felt drained but hopeful about tomorrow.

meaningThai: ยังเจ็บ แต่กำลังดีขึ้น
examples: I’m raw but healing.
He’s raw but healing from the past.

meaningThai: ตั้งอยู่บนสติ, ใจมั่นคง
examples: Meditation keeps me emotionally grounded.
She feels emotionally grounded lately.

meaningThai: ดีขึ้นแล้ว แต่ยังไม่แข็งแรงดี
examples: I’m restored but fragile.
Her hope is restored but fragile.

meaningThai: เปิดใจ รับฟังได้
examples: He’s very open-hearted.
I’m trying to be open-hearted.

meaningThai: ปกป้องใจตัวเองไว้ก่อน
examples: I’ve been emotionally protective lately.
She’s emotionally protective of her peace.

meaningThai: อารมณ์ท่วมท้น
examples: I’m emotionally overwhelmed by everything.
She felt emotionally overwhelmed by the support.

meaningThai: สบายใจ ขี้เล่น
examples: I feel lighthearted today.
He’s fun and lighthearted.

meaningThai: รู้สึกปลอดภัยทางอารมณ์
examples: I feel emotionally safe around you.
She creates an emotionally safe space.

meaningThai: สงบแต่มีความเศร้าอยู่
examples: I’m calm but sad about it.
She looked calm but sad today.

meaningThai: มีความหวังจากใจจริง
examples: I’m emotionally hopeful for change.
He felt emotionally hopeful again.

meaningThai: ใจหนักแต่ยังเดินต่อ
examples: I’m heart-heavy but moving forward.
She’s heart-heavy but continuing.

meaningThai: อ่อนโยนทางอารมณ์
examples: He speaks in an emotionally gentle way.
I’m learning to be emotionally gentle with myself.

meaningThai: อยู่กับปัจจุบัน แต่ใจล้า
examples: I’m emotionally present but tired.
She felt emotionally present but tired from work.

meaningThai: หม่นหมอง, มืดมน
examples: The weather makes me feel gloomy.
He had a gloomy expression.

meaningThai: เปราะบางทางอารมณ์
examples: I’m emotionally vulnerable right now.
She felt emotionally vulnerable after opening up.

meaningThai: มีความหวังแต่ยังเปราะ
examples: I’m hopeful but fragile today.
Her hope felt fragile yet real.

meaningThai: ใจเบา สว่าง สดใส
examples: I feel heartlight this morning.
Her laugh makes everyone feel heartlight.

meaningThai: ใจอุ่นขึ้นอย่างชัดเจน
examples: Your message made me feel emotionally warmed.
He felt emotionally warmed by the gesture.

meaningThai: ใจหม่น, คิดอะไรไม่ออก
examples: My mind feels emotionally clouded.
She sounded emotionally clouded today.

meaningThai: ซื่อตรงกับความรู้สึกตัวเอง
examples: I’m trying to be emotionally honest.
He appreciates emotionally honest conversations.

meaningThai: อารมณ์ยุ่งเหยิง, สับสน
examples: I’m emotionally messy right now.
She felt emotionally messy after the argument.

meaningThai: กำลังดีขึ้นทีละน้อย
examples: I feel emotionally rising this week.
Her mood is emotionally rising again.

meaningThai: อยู่ในช่วงฟื้นฟูทางอารมณ์
examples: I’m emotionally recovering slowly.
She’s emotionally recovering from the loss.

meaningThai: ใจโล่ง, รู้ว่าต้องการอะไร
examples: I finally feel emotionally clear.
She sounded emotionally clear about her decision.

meaningThai: ใจนิ่ง, ไม่สวิงแรง
examples: Meditation keeps me emotionally centered.
He feels emotionally centered today.

meaningThai: มีสติ แต่ยังมีความเศร้าอยู่
examples: I’m emotionally grounded but sad.
She felt grounded but sad at the same time.

meaningThai: เปิดเผยอารมณ์ตรงไปตรงมา
examples: She’s emotionally transparent.
I’m learning to be emotionally transparent.

meaningThai: รู้สึกมีชีวิตชีวาทางอารมณ์
examples: I feel emotionally alive again.
The moment made me feel emotionally alive.

meaningThai: มีหวังแต่ก็กลัว
examples: I’m emotionally hopeful but scared.
She felt hopeful but scared of change.

meaningThai: ครุ่นคิดทางใจ, ทบทวน
examples: I’m emotionally reflective tonight.
He gets emotionally reflective at night.

meaningThai: ใจนิ่ง, สงบลงแล้ว
examples: I feel settled after talking to you.
Her heart finally felt settled.

meaningThai: ใจเบา สดใส มากกว่าปกติ
examples: I feel emotionally light today.
The morning air made me emotionally light.

meaningThai: ครบถ้วนทางอารมณ์, ฟื้นเต็มที่
examples: I feel emotionally whole again.
Time helped her feel emotionally whole.
